name: Baccarat - Nicaragua - Rothschild
additionalNotes: Baccarat Nicaragua adds a medium-bodied profile to Davidoff’s popular and sugary Baccarat brand. Handmade to Davidoff’s uncompromising standards, Baccarat Nicaragua is drafted from a Cuban-seed wrapper and an eventful blend of interior tobaccos from Nicaragua and Sumatra. Baccarat is a solid, sweet, and value-based smoke when you need an enticing and approachable cigar to share with your pals on poker night. Choose from a handful of traditional shapes.
